# CoreX security - mfa

This package provides an implementation of the CoreX security interface for mfa.

## Installation
~~~bash
pip install corex-security-mfa
~~~

## Usage
~~~python
from corex_security_mfa.handler import MfaHandler
handler = MfaHandler()
handler.example_method()
~~~
